item.title: Cyclistic - Analyzing User Behavior
item.description: üì∑ Clique Studio/Unsplash Introduction This project is my attempt to solve the first case study from the Google Data Analytics Professional Certificate Capstone Projects on Coursera that you can access here. I really enjoy working on this project because not like other data projects I have ever solved before. The challenge on this project is ranging from the size of the data provided, to the working on how to create a meaningful analysis to solve the main problem itself.
